name: Molecular Biophysics
description: Topics to be covered will include: review of basic protein structure; molecular forces; thermodynamics of living systems: protein folding, physics of many-particle systems; open systems and chemical thermodynamics: Gibbs free energy and chemical potential; bioenergetics and molecular motors; electrical properties of living cells: Poisson-Boltzmann, membrane potential, cardiac cell and other excitable cells; chemical kinetics and reactions; mechanical properties of biomolecules; molecular manipulation techniques.
